text: The Adjustable Redstone Lamp is a very useful block. You can adjust the brightness of the lamp in two ways:
$(li)Right clicking will increase the brightness of the lamp by 1.
$(li)Providing a redstone signal will lock the lamp at a brightness equal to the signal strength.

pages.title: More Details
text: The lamp will emit a comparator signal equal to it's brightness level.
$(br)Due to limitations in Minecraft, lamps of brightness 14 and 15 output the same amount of light. Redstone functionality is still retained appropriately though.

pages.text: Speaking of Redstone functionality, $(t:Like the Copper Bulb should have)$(thing)the lamp updates every tick.$(/t)/$ This allows for much smoother animation and more precise timing for redstone contraptions.
